title: El Sexo Debil
overview: El Sexo Débil is a Mexican Spanish language telenovela produced by Argos Television for Cadena Tres and Sony Pictures Television for Cadena Tres. It stars Itatí Cantoral, Mauricio Ochmann, Khotan Fernández, Raul Mendez, Pablo Cruz and Arturo Rios. The series-made-telenovela is set to air on 7 February 2011 at 10:00pm.
